info.name: Trello Ultimate Flat
info.description: A flat ui style for Trello that I created to use in-house. I wanted style and maximum usage of available space so trimmed margins, nice fonts that read well small, .
info.additionalInfo:
Update  5/7/19 
Adjusted list wrapper width to prevent overflow
Made label text visible
Removed unnecessary !important tags
Commented custom header and canvas background colors if you want to use the default Trello colors 

Update 4/28/16
Removed padding in .window-wrapper to fix issues with cards opening on smaller screens

data.title: Thank you so much. Here is my addition for seeing the text of labels.
